modShortDescription: This mod makes the 3 different types of wine barrels found in the game lootable. 33% chance of finding a version still lootable.
modDescription:
This mod makes the 3 different types of wine barrels found in the game lootable.

**Adds**:

* Lootable wine barrels to the game
* 66% chance of finding a non lootable version
* 33% chance of finding a version still lootable

(This mimicks the someone has already been thru and looted and some were missed)

## Changelog

Added recipes to make the wine barrels.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/stallionsden/stallionsmodlets/tree/main/Stallionsdens%20Home%20Brewery)**
